Package: com.bmuschko.gradle.cargo.tasks.daemon

[Groovy] Class CargoDaemon

      • com.bmuschko.gradle.cargo.tasks.daemon.CargoDaemon

        • Properties Summary

            Properties 
            Type Name and description
            FileCollection  classpath
            java.lang.String  handleId
            The handle ID identifying a specific container configuration.
            java.lang.String  hostname
            Host name on which the container listens to.
            java.lang.String  password
            Password to use to authenticate against a remote container.
            java.lang.Integer  port
            Port on which the daemon listens to.
            java.lang.String  protocol
            Protocol on which the container is listening to.
            java.lang.String  username
            Username to use to authenticate against a remote container.

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            java.lang.Object createDaemonClient(java.net.URLClassLoader classLoader)
            void messageDaemon()
            void performDaemonOperation(java.lang.Object daemonClient, java.net.URLClassLoader classLoader)

        • Property Detail

          • @InputFiles FileCollection classpath

          • @Input java.lang.String handleId

            The handle ID identifying a specific container configuration.

          • @Input java.lang.String hostname

            Host name on which the container listens to. Defaults to 'localhost'.

          • @Input @Optional java.lang.String password

            Password to use to authenticate against a remote container.

          • @Input java.lang.Integer port

            Port on which the daemon listens to.

          • @Input java.lang.String protocol

            Protocol on which the container is listening to. Defaults to 'http'.

          • @Input @Optional java.lang.String username

            Username to use to authenticate against a remote container.

        • Method Detail

          • java.lang.Object createDaemonClient(java.net.URLClassLoader classLoader)

          • @TaskAction void messageDaemon()

          • void performDaemonOperation(java.lang.Object daemonClient, java.net.URLClassLoader classLoader)
